name: A sheep adventure II
description:
Premise

You are a curious sheep.  Once you enter a house and then space traveled to another world. There are many dangers here, try to succeed through these dangers and become successful.

Control

WD to move

SPACE to jump

Things To Do

try to pass the grassland. Don't be killed by the slime, avoid falling from the ground. Good luck:)

Enjoy the game:D This is prototype version so it may has some bug in here
